txt.en:
'Greetings traveller. I watch those who stride the roads of Middle-earth in search of challenge and adventure. Yet there are those who become weary of battle and wish to explore the world in relative peace.'

'If you seek to tread upon gentler roads once again, I can set your feet upon that path.'

<rgb=#FFFF00>Completing this quest will return the game to its normal difficulty.</rgb>
Completing this quest will turn your difficulty back down to normal levels.

'Are you certain you wish to return to the easier path? 'Tis entirely understandable - such harsh endeavours are surely not for everyone.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Completing this quest will also PERMANENTLY prevent the completion of any difficulty title deeds, those you are pursuing now, and any you may want to pursue in the future!</rgb>
Your road ahead has become easier...
Completing this quest will return you to normal difficulty and permanently prevent the completion of any difficulty based deeds.
